page.seoDescription: Whatagraph getting too expensive? Flipika offers unlimited scaling and flat pricing for growing agencies.
page.subtitle: Scale your agency without your software bill exploding.
page.painPointsSubtitle: Success shouldn't come with a price penalty.
page.costSubtitle: Don't pay extra just for connecting more sources.
page.migrationCtaDesc: Switch to Flipika for predictable, flat-rate pricing.

speed.title: Predictable Cost
speed.description: Flat monthly fee. Sign 100 new clients tomorrow, your Flipika bill stays exactly the same.

realtime.title: Visual Impact
realtime.description: We match Whatagraph's visual quality but add interactivity and glassmorphism.

design.title: Client Portal
design.description: Give clients access to their data 24/7 without paying seat license fees.

whitelabel.title: Full White Label
whitelabel.description: Your brand front and center. No 'Powered by' badges on paid plans.

ai.title: AI Analysis
ai.description: Automated insights that explain the chart movements. Save analyst hours.

support.title: Agency Partnership
support.description: We help you sell. Use our 'Pitch Mode' to close new deals.

ecommerce.title: Volume Retail
ecommerce.description: Track many data points without hitting source limits.

leadgen.title: High Velocity
leadgen.description: Keep CPA low by keeping tool costs low.

agency.title: Enterprise Agency
agency.description: Manage 100+ accounts efficiently. Whatagraph costs skyrocket here; Flipika doesn't.

local.title: Small Biz Network
local.description: Great for serving many small clients profitably.

saas.title: Growth Startups
saas.description: Track everything during your growth phase without tool tax.

step1.title: Check Pricing
step1.description: Look at your last Whatagraph bill. Now look at Flipika pricing. Smile.

step2.title: Migrate Data
step2.description: Connect your sources. We visualize the exact same data instantly.

step3.title: Rebrand
step3.description: Upload your assets. The reports will look just as premium (or better).

step4.title: Pocket Savings
step4.description: Reinvest the savings into your team or your own marketing.

time.title: Setup Time
time.description: Flipika is faster to configure. Global templates apply instantly to all clients.

maintenance.title: Contract Lock-in
maintenance.description: Flipika is flexible. No aggressive annual upselling calls.

opportunity.title: Growth Cap
opportunity.description: Don't turn down small clients because software costs kill the margin. Flipika makes small clients profitable.

tip1.title: Compare Margins
tip1.description: Calculate your software cost per client. Switch if it exceeds 2% of your fee.

tip2.title: Use Live Links
tip2.description: Switch clients from receiving PDFs to checking a live link. It's stickier.

tip3.title: Video Narratives
tip3.description: Record a Loom over a Flipika dashboard. Clients love the personal touch.

tip4.title: Team Access
tip4.description: Invite your whole team. We don't charge per user seat.

tip5.title: Consolidate
tip5.description: Put all clients in one portal, even the small ones.

tip6.title: Upsell Reporting
tip6.description: Charge a premium for 'Advanced Dashboarding'â€”your cost stays the same.

tip7.title: Export Data
tip7.description: Need raw data? Export to CSV/Excel anytime for deeper analysis.

faq.a1: Yes. Within fair use policy, we don't count every connected account against you.
faq.a2: Yes, PDF export is pixel-perfect for printing or email attachments.
faq.a3: Reviewers often find Flipika more modern. Whatagraph is 'infographic style', we are 'app style'.
faq.a4: Yes, totally white labeled on custom domain.
faq.a5: Monthly available. Annual gets a discount.
faq.a6: Focus on Google Ads ecosystem initially. If you need 50+ obscure integrations, stick with them. If you need deep Google Ads, pick us.
faq.a7: Responsive and helpful. We want you to succeed.
faq.a8: We can help migrate your first few templates to ensure a smooth switch.
